name: ANSUMAN DAs
body: I had bought this product as a gift for my son birthday on 1st-JAN-2018. When he opened it yesterday, the wath is not projecting any image.This is really unacceptable.

name: Aavesh Raj
body: I bought a few watches as return gifts for my kids bday ... All watches work goods.

name: Sanjoy Rana
body: Nothing could be better at this price range.As it is a Chinese product you should use it carefully for better longevity. My junior is super happy.THANK YOU.

name: Trishna Jahan
body: There is a cute film view in the watch. That's cute.. When switch on the light and show it against the wall, u can see 24 illuminated Spiderman images on the wall .

name: Zaman Imam
body: The watch is very beautiful that I had.
